description:
HSection component provides a horizontal section layout with optional
collapsible content, label, and sublabel.
name: Section

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Basic usage

Content goes here...

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With sublabel
<HSection
label="Account Information"
sublabel="Personal details and settings"
>
<FormContent />
</HSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Collapsible section
<HSection
label="Advanced Settings"
sublabel="Configuration options for advanced users"
collapsible
>
<AdvancedSettings />
</HSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Collapsed by default
<HSection
label="Optional Information"
collapsible
collapseByDefault
>
<OptionalFields />
</HSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Multiple sections
<VStack>
<HSection label="Basic Information">
<BasicInfoForm />
</HSection>

<HSection
label="Advanced Settings"
collapsible
collapseByDefault
>
<AdvancedSettings />
</HSection>
</VStack>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Basic usage

Content goes here...

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With sublabel
<VSection
label="Payment Information"
sublabel="Add your payment details"
>
<PaymentForm />
</VSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With actions
<VSection
label="Order Details"
actions={
<>
<Button>Print</Button>
<Button variant="primary">Edit</Button>
</>
}
>
<OrderDetails />
</VSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Custom label type
<VSection
label="Order Summary"
labelType="subheader"
sublabel="Order #12345"
>
<OrderSummary />
</VSection>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Multiple sections
<VStack spacing={32}>
<VSection
label="Shipping Information"
actions={<Button>Edit</Button>}
>
<ShippingDetails />
</VSection>

<VSection
label="Payment Method"
sublabel="Select your payment method"
actions={<Button>Add Payment</Button>}
>
<PaymentOptions />
</VSection>
</VStack>
